tool.name: OTB.DSFuzzyModelEstimation
tool.description: Estimate feature fuzzy model parameters using 2 vector data (ground truth samples and wrong samples).
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraypsin False isArraynsin False isArrayinitmod False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.DSFuzzyModelEstimation psin $psin nsin $nsin belsup '$belsup' plasup '$plasup' cri '$cri' wgt $wgt initmod $initmod desclist '$desclist' maxnbit $maxnbit optobs $optobs prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: psin
param.label: Ground truth vector data for positive samples
param.help: Ground truth vector data for positive samples The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, zip

param.name: nsin
param.label: Ground truth vector data for negative samples
param.help: Ground truth vector data for negative samples The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, zip

param.name: belsup
param.label: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute belief
param.help: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute belief

param.name: plasup
param.label: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute plausibility
param.help: Dempster Shafer study hypothesis to compute plausibility

param.name: wgt
param.label: Coefficient between 0 and 1 to promote undetection or false detections (default 0.5)
param.help: Coefficient between 0 and 1 to promote undetection or false detections (default 0.5)

param.name: initmod
param.label: Initialization model (xml file) to be used. If the xml initialization model is set, the descriptor list is not used (specified using the option -desclist)
param.help: Initialization model (xml file) to be used. If the xml initialization model is set, the descriptor list is not used (specified using the option -desclist) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: desclist
param.label: List of the descriptors to be used in the model (must be specified to perform an automatic initialization)
param.help: List of the descriptors to be used in the model (must be specified to perform an automatic initialization)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Estimate feature fuzzy model parameters using 2 vector data (ground truth samples and wrong samples).
